question: The “Sushma Swaraj Lectures” which is introduced by the External Affairs Ministry is designed for which target section?
explanation:
‘Sushma Swaraj Lectures’ has been introduced by Ministry of External Affairs, Institute of foreign service and the India Foundation. The lecture series has been designed for foreign diplomats posted in India.
The inaugural session of the lectures titled “in the memory of former External Affairs Minister Swaraj”, was delivered by Foreign Secretary Harsh Vardhan Shringla.
